alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 5:13PM AKST until December 20 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light freezing rain occurring. A light glaze of ice is expected. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light freezing rain has been reported at Bettles and is likely occuring in other areas. The freezing rain should end about 9pm as a cold front passes through the area. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
